title: Grey Shield Research LLC
text:
Welcome to Grey Shield Research
We specialize in analyzing post-arrest research data. Whether you are a criminal justice agency, an advocacy group, a university, or another entity that needs data analyzed we are here to provide data driven, evidence based solutions for your criminal justice needs. Our staff includes a former Correctional Officer, Ivy League alumni (University of Pennsylvania), and a research scientist at an R1 University (and that is just our founder!).
We are here to research the issues in criminal justice that effect your agency. We have experience analyzing issues ranging from gang management, to Pre-trial assessment, to PREA. s



Our Mascot: Brian the Brain

title: About
text:
About Grey Shield Research LLC
Proudly located in Albuquerque, New Mexico, we believe in traditional Southwestern American values, such as hard work, perseverance, and respect. We are dedicated to the production of high quality criminal justice research. The science and statistics are always our first priority, and we are uncompromising in our approach to research.
Although we are open to other projects, we specialize in Pre-trial Assessment validation (Incl. the Public Safety Assessment), correctional policy analysis, and other post-arrest studies.
Our staff has a passion for post-arrest criminal justice and criminology. Whether you need a quick statistical report, ongoing data analysis for the Jail Reimbursement Act or PREA, or a partner in a long term project, consider Grey Shield Research.

title: Services
text:
At Grey Shield Research LLC, we offer a range of services designed to meet the unique needs of each client. Our areas of expertise includes:




Does your data come to you in a format that is less than optimal for your organization? Is it a bit messy or come from outdated software? Whether you need complete conversion from paper to excel or PDF to SPSS, we can assist you with data cleaning and management.



Whether you need simple population statistics, or complicated statistical analysis, we can offer the right solutions for your organization.



Are you a university or academy who needs a guest lecturer? Whether for one day or an entire semester, I can speak to your students about any range of post-arrest criminal justice subjects, as well as statistics and methods. I can appear virtually or in-person.
Explore how our services can benefit you, and reach out to us to discuss your specific needs.

title: Grey Shield Research LLC - Services
text:
Daniel Goldberg M.S. has over a decade in combined experience and education in criminal justice. As a former Correctional Officer with the Texas Department of Criminal Justice (TDCJ), Daniel knows what it is like to walk the tier and the realities of managing inmates. During his time in TDCJ, he worked primarily in General Population, however, he has experience in working in High Security, and Psychiatric settings. After working as a Correctional Officer, Daniel received his Masters of Science in Criminology from the University of Pennsylvania. After his time in Pennsylvania, he was an adjunct professor and research assistant the University of Central Florida, where he was also an editor’s assistant at an academic journal, Corrections: Policy Practice and Research.
On his off time, he enjoys riding his motorcycle, reading, watching the Arizona Diamondbacks, and taking care of his beloved rabbits, Phoenix and Cowboy.
